name: part_002
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠・昼公演】AZKi Major Debut LiVE「声音エントロピー」【#AZKiワンマン #AZKiワンマン横浜昼】 [2ZvJOnftaSI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Promotional slide for AZKi's major debut live additional performance schedule.
Music video snippets for the song 'Entropy' with album release information.
Display of the tracklist and limited edition details for the album 'Route If'.
Information regarding album purchase benefits and recommendation campaigns.
One-man live benefits and additional performance schedule recap.
Extended music video snippet and promotional montage for 'Entropy'.
Snippet of the song 'Gogo 8-ji no Chorus Song'.
Snippet of the song 'Akekenai Yoru ga Attanara (Acoustic Arrange Ver.)'.
Snippet of the song 'Yoru no Senpuku' and list of crowdfunding supporters.

subtitles.original: 急遽！追加公演決定！
subtitles.english: Urgent! Additional performance decided!

subtitles.original: 捕まえた でも逃げた
subtitles.english: I caught it, but it got away

subtitles.original: 繰り返す本能には
subtitles.english: In the repeating instinct

subtitles.original: 諦める術はない
subtitles.english: There's no way to give up

subtitles.original: 無にさえも手を伸ばした
subtitles.english: Extended a hand even to nothingness

subtitles.original: だから強く見つめ合えば
subtitles.english: So if we gaze strongly at each other

subtitles.original: 今を生き抜く術
subtitles.english: The way to survive the present

subtitles.original: 描けそうで色のない
subtitles.english: Faintly drawn, yet colorless

subtitles.original: 未来を避けた
subtitles.english: Avoided the future

subtitles.original: 答えはわかんないよ
subtitles.english: I don't know the answer

subtitles.original: 今は分岐は無限でも
subtitles.english: Even if the branches are infinite now

subtitles.original: 君と交差したい時の果て
subtitles.english: I want to cross paths with you at the end of time

subtitles.original: 期待値が高すぎたって
subtitles.english: Even if expectations were too high

subtitles.original: そこに追いついて
subtitles.english: Catching up there

subtitles.original: 今はつまり何がどうだって
subtitles.english: Now, no matter what's what

subtitles.original: 嘘は負ける 星が隠してしまう
subtitles.english: Lies lose, the stars hide them away

subtitles.original: 綺麗な偽りを見抜いて
subtitles.english: See through the beautiful lies

subtitles.original: メジャー 1st アルバム Route If 配信中！
subtitles.english: Major 1st Album Route If Now streaming!

subtitles.original: 紐解いた また増えた
subtitles.english: Unraveled, increased again

subtitles.original: 残すしかない運命なら
subtitles.english: If it's a fate that must be left behind

subtitles.original: 振り返る暇はない
subtitles.english: There's no time to look back

subtitles.original: 闇よりも早い選択
subtitles.english: A choice faster than the darkness

subtitles.original: 誰を満たす 誰かよりも
subtitles.english: Satisfy someone, more than anyone else

subtitles.original: まずは胸の中 凝視
subtitles.english: First, gaze into the heart

subtitles.original: 黒い闇に星はただ
subtitles.english: In the black darkness, stars just

subtitles.original: 輝きを真っ直ぐに届ける
subtitles.english: Deliver their brilliance straight ahead

subtitles.original: 君はどう思うかな
subtitles.english: What do you think?

subtitles.original: 今は全貌は知らないけど
subtitles.english: Now, I don't know the whole picture, but

subtitles.original: 君と共鳴した 青い鼓動
subtitles.english: The blue heartbeat resonated with you

subtitles.original: 揺らいでる境界の前で
subtitles.english: In front of the swaying boundary

subtitles.original: 消えないように 吐露の本音
subtitles.english: Lest it disappears, the true feelings exposed

subtitles.original: 今はいつのまにかでも
subtitles.english: Now, even if it was before I knew it

subtitles.original: 嘘に染まる なんて無理だ
subtitles.english: Impossible to be dyed in lies

subtitles.original: これなら 届きそうで
subtitles.english: With this, it seems reachable

subtitles.original: これなら 遠くまで
subtitles.english: With this, far away

subtitles.original: 信じて 信じて 信じたくて
subtitles.english: Believe, believe, I want to believe

subtitles.original: ここまでこれたから
subtitles.english: Because I've come this far

subtitles.original: 壊れても 壊れても
subtitles.english: Even if it breaks, even if it breaks

subtitles.original: 静かに小さな駆け引き
subtitles.english: A quiet, small bargain

subtitles.original: 蘇る音 こんなに大事に感じるのは
subtitles.english: The sound reviving, why it feels so precious

subtitles.original: きっと君との絆だからね
subtitles.english: Is surely because of our bond

subtitles.original: 今は分岐は無限でも
subtitles.english: Even if the branches are infinite now

subtitles.original: 君と交差したい時の果て
subtitles.english: I want to cross paths with you at the end of time

subtitles.original: 期待値が高すぎたって
subtitles.english: Even if expectations were too high

subtitles.original: そこに追いついて
subtitles.english: Catching up there

subtitles.original: 今はつまり何がどうだって
subtitles.english: Now, no matter what's what

subtitles.original: 嘘は負ける 星が隠してしまう
subtitles.english: Lies lose, the stars hide them away

subtitles.original: 綺麗な世界で生きていた
subtitles.english: I was living in a beautiful world

subtitles.original: そんなの狡いのかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if that's unfair

subtitles.original: 偽りを見抜いて
subtitles.english: See through the lies

subtitles.original: ああ 一言みたいな夜だ
subtitles.english: Ah, it's a night like a single word

subtitles.original: ばらまいた星だけが綺麗に澄んでいる
subtitles.english: Only the scattered stars are beautifully clear

subtitles.original: そんなに綺麗にはなれないや
subtitles.english: I can't become that beautiful

subtitles.original: それでも今夜 行くための歌
subtitles.english: Still, tonight, it's a song to keep going

subtitles.original: ああ ほんの小さな夜だ
subtitles.english: Ah, it's just a small night

subtitles.original: 寝るには早く 夜明けはまだ遠く
subtitles.english: Too early to sleep, the dawn is still far away

subtitles.original: 憧れるには遅く
subtitles.english: Too late to yearn

subtitles.original: 挫けるにはまだ早いよ
subtitles.english: Too early to give up

subtitles.original: 言葉はいつまでも下手だよ
subtitles.english: I'm always bad with words

subtitles.original: ため息だけが上手になるよ
subtitles.english: I only get better at sighing

subtitles.original: 傷つくたび 違う
subtitles.english: Every time I get hurt, it's different

subtitles.original: 生き物だと知るんだ
subtitles.english: I realize I'm a living thing

subtitles.original: いつだって 暗闇で迷子
subtitles.english: Always lost in the darkness

subtitles.original: 明けない夜があったなら
subtitles.english: If there was a night that never broke

subtitles.original: このまま溶けて消えたいな
subtitles.english: I'd want to just melt away and disappear like this

subtitles.original: 明けない夜があったって
subtitles.english: Even if there was a night that never broke

subtitles.original: 私はきらめく星になれなくていい
subtitles.english: I don't need to be a twinkling star

subtitles.original: きらめく星になれなくていい
subtitles.english: I don't need to be a twinkling star

subtitles.original: ああ 本日も閉店です
subtitles.english: Ah, closed for today as well

subtitles.original: どうにかこうにか一日
subtitles.english: Somehow or other, a day

subtitles.original: ひっそりこっそりよく頑張り
subtitles.english: Quietly and secretly did my best

subtitles.original: 何かは残せたのでしょうか
subtitles.english: I wonder if I left something behind

subtitles.original: 希望的だ
subtitles.english: It's hopeful

subtitles.original: 差し入れを贈ってくださった開拓者の皆様、本当にありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: To all the Pioneers who sent gifts, thank you so much!
